DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the drug-drug interaction between montelukast sodium and levocetirizine dihydrochloride in healthy male volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: A Drug Interaction Study of Montelukast and Levocetirizine
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Age between 20 and 55 Signed informed consent Has a history of hypersensitivity to IP ingredients Hypotension or hypertension Has a history of acute infection within 14days of screening
